mapper.select: SELECT C.name AS extra__certName, E.* FROM exam E INNER JOIN certificate C ON E.certId = C.id ORDER BY C.name;
SELECT DISTINCT C.name AS `name`, C.id AS id FROM certificate C JOIN exam E ON C.id = E.certId ORDER BY C.name;

SELECT Q.id, Q.questNum, Q.body AS questionBody, Q.hasImage, Q.imgUrl, CS.subjectNum AS extra__subjectNum, CS.name AS extra__subjectName, C.id AS choiceId, C.label, C.body AS choiceBody, C.isCorrect AS isCorrect FROM questions Q JOIN (SELECT questId FROM choices GROUP BY questId HAVING COUNT(*) = 4) valid_Q ON Q.id = valid_Q.questId JOIN choices C ON Q.id = c.questId JOIN certSubject CS ON Q.subjectId = CS.id WHERE Q.examId = #{examId} ORDER BY Q.questNum ASC, C.label ASC

SELECT Q.id, Q.questNum, Q.body AS questionBody, Q.hasImage, Q.imgUrl, CS.subjectNum AS extra__subjectNum, CS.name AS extra__subjectName, C.id AS choiceId, C.label, C.body AS choiceBody, C.isCorrect AS isCorrect FROM (SELECT Q.* FROM questions Q JOIN (SELECT questId FROM choices GROUP BY questId HAVING COUNT(*) = 4) valid_Q ON Q.ID = valid_Q.questId WHERE Q.certId = #{certId} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT #{questionCount}) Q JOIN choices C ON Q.ID = C.questId JOIN certSubject CS ON Q.subjectId = CS.ID ORDER BY Q.questNum, C.label
